channel.title: Trying to figure out on how to run the game from a webbrowser
channel.description:
I'm trying to get my client to run on my website. The following code used to work when the run.bat file just had to run client:
[code]<html> <title>WEBCLIENT NAME</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="jarname.jar" code="client"> </applet></center> </html> [/code]
Now, with the jar having multiple parameters, such as:
[code]java client 0 live english game0[/code]
I'm confused on how to integrate that into a html document. Would anyone mind assisting me?

I’m trying to get my client to run on my website. The following code used to work when the run.bat file just had to run client:

[code]

WEBCLIENT NAME [/code]

Now, with the jar having multiple parameters, such as:

java client 0 live english game0

I’m confused on how to integrate that into a html document. Would anyone mind assisting me?
